meanings.sent1: The old machine was unautomated and required manual operation.
meanings.sent2: The unautomated process took longer to complete compared to the automated one.
meanings.sent3: It was quite a challenge to work with the unautomated system in this modern age.
meanings.sent4: Her unautomated approach to problem-solving brought a unique perspective to the team.
meanings.sent5: The unautomated factory hummed with the sounds of workers and machinery working together.

meanings.definition: Not having the capability to operate automatically
meanings.sent1: The unautomated device needed constant human intervention to function.
meanings.sent2: In a world of smart technology, the unautomated device seemed out of place.
meanings.sent3: Trying to use the unautomated software felt like taking a step back in time.
meanings.sent4: His unautomated car required him to manually adjust everything, unlike the newer models.
meanings.sent5: The unautomated system struggled to keep up with the demands of the modern world.
